question: Which of the following statements are correct with respect to the role of cabinet?
option1: It is the highest decision-making authority
option2: It is the chief policy formulating body
option3: It is the chief coordinator of Central administration
explanation: All the statements are correct with respect to the role of cabinet. It is the highest decision-making authority and also the chief policy formulating body of the Central government. It is chief coordinator of Central administration.
